root.name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: Slam Dunk: Shikyou Gekitotsu!!
root.description: A special limited edition entitled From TV animation - Slam Dunk: Dream Team Shueisha Limited was also released. It includes only All-star teams.A sequel with better graphics, sound, gameplay and new teams From TV animation - Slam Dunk 2: IH Yosen Kanzenban!! was released in 1995.
